description: Integer overflow in Gaim before 0.82 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via the size variable in Groupware server messages.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0754

description: The FileStore capability in CGI::Session for Ruby before 1.8.1, and possibly PStore, creates files with insecure permissions, which can allow local users to steal session information and hijack sessions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0755

description: libpng 1.2.5 and earlier does not properly calculate certain buffer offsets, which could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a buffer overflow attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0768

description: Double free vulnerabilities in error handling code in krb524d for MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) 1.2.8 and earlier may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0772

description: Buffer overflow in WIDCOMM Bluetooth Connectivity Software, as used in products such as BTStackServer 1.3.2.7 and 1.4.2.10, Windows XP and Windows 98 with MSI Bluetooth Dongles, and HP IPAQ 5450 running WinCE 3.0, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via certain service requests.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0775

description: Format string vulnerability in the auth_debug function in Courier-IMAP 1.6.0 through 2.2.1 and 3.x through 3.0.3, when login debugging (DEBUG_LOGIN) is enabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0777
